text:
Hi everyone. I am willing to learn to use and then contribute to the NeuralPDE package. But there are some installation issues. I tried using Pkg.add("NeuralPDE") in REPL but the following error messages occured:
INFO: Initializing package repository /home/shobhit/.julia/v0.4
INFO: Cloning METADATA from <git://github.com/JuliaLang/METADATA.jl>
ERROR: unknown package NeuralPDE
 [inlined code] from ./pkg/entry.jl:49
 in anonymous at ./task.jl:447
 [inlined code] from ./task.jl:422
 in add at ./pkg/entry.jl:64

I searched for the NeuralPDE package on the <http://github.com/JuliaLang/METADATA.jl|github.com/JuliaLang/METADATA.jl> page but couldn't find it
Can someone please help me out.. I have just learnt to use Julia

text: I'm guessing you're on an old version of julia judging from `/home/shobhit/.julia/v0.4` ? The package management has changed significantly since, so NeuralPDE won't be found by v0.4. Maybe try upgrading to julia 1.5 and try again?
